Class Operation

extends Object

    • Method Detail

      • subtotal

        public static double subtotal​(boolean discountTicket,
                              double price)
        Calculates the subtotal cost of products, considering whether a discount coupon is applied.
        Parameters:
        discountTicket - Determines if the customer has a discount coupon.
        price - The price of the product.
        Returns:
        The cost of the products with or without discount.

      • shipping

        public static int shipping​(int distance)
        Calculates the shipping cost based on the distance the delivery driver has to travel.
        Parameters:
        distance - The distance our delivery driver has to travel.
        Returns:
        The cost the customer has to pay according to the distance our delivery driver has to travel.

      • total

        public static double total​(double subtotal,
                           double iva,
                           double shipping)
        Calculates the total cost the customer has to pay after taxes (IVA) and shipping costs.
        Parameters:
        subtotal - The cost of the products after discounts.
        iva - The taxes (IVA) applied to the subtotal amount of money.
        shipping - The cost of shipping.
        Returns:
        The total the customer has to pay after taxes (IVA) and shipping costs.

      • iva

        public static double iva​(double subtotal)
        Calculates the taxes (IVA) applied to the subtotal amount of money and rounds them.
        Parameters:
        subtotal - The cost of the products after discounts.
        Returns:
        The taxes (IVA) applied to the subtotal amount of money and rounded.

      • productTotal

        public static double productTotal​(double productSubtotal,
                                  int quantity)
        Calculates the total cost of a product after discounts multiplied by the quantity.
        Parameters:
        productSubtotal - The price of the product after discount.
        quantity - The amount of the product the customer wants.
        Returns:
        The result of the multiplication between our product price after discounts with the amount of the same product the customer wants.

      • discountAmount

        public static double discountAmount​(boolean discountTicket,
                                    double price,
                                    int quantity)
        Calculates the discount amount based on whether the customer has a discount coupon.
        Parameters:
        discountTicket - Determines if the customer has a discount coupon.
        price - The price of the product.
        quantity - The quantity of the product.
        Returns:
        The price of the product multiplied by the discount percentage (The discount amount).

      • commission

        public static double commission​(double subtotal)
        Calculates the commission that the company receives.
        Parameters:
        subtotal - The total amount received from the customer.
        Returns:
        The total that we as a company receive.
